abstract: Modifies the date format style to use the specified time zone format style.
overview:
## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified time zone format style.

## Discussion

Values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone] are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/exemplarLocation] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/genericLocation].

Static methods that return [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone] objects include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/genericName(_:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/identifier(_:)],  [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/iso8601(_:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/localizedGMT(_:)], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/specificName(_:)].

# timeZone(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified time zone format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func timeZone(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.TimeZone = .specificName(.short)) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The time zone format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified time zone format style.

## Discussion

Values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone] are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/exemplarLocation] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/genericLocation].

Static methods that return [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone] objects include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/genericName(_:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/identifier(_:)],  [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/iso8601(_:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/localizedGMT(_:)], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/TimeZone/specificName(_:)].

## Specifying the Time Format

- **hour(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified hour format style.
- **minute(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified minute format style.
- **second(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified second format style.
- **secondFraction(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified second fraction format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle**: Type that defines time styles varied in length or components included.

items.description: Modifies the date format style to use the specified hour format style.
